subject: Re: [junit] Testing getXXX( ) and setXXX( ) methods
msgSnippet: ... Why don t you just combine these tests without the inner class? car.setColor (blue); assert_equal (car.getColor, blue); I would not like modifying
messageBody:
On Wednesday 01 May 2002 20:27, raju99 wrote:
> Hi,
>
> I am trying to answer the following question for myself -
> "What is the best approach for testing get/set methods ?"
>

Why don't you just combine these tests without the inner class?

car.setColor (blue);
assert_equal (car.getColor, blue);

I would not like modifying production code (adding classes) just for
test purposes.

Robert
